author: alci tron
comment: Wonderfull

author: Michael stansfield
comment: Don't know if it's just been updated? But it's stopped working on my Huawei watch!

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Can you send me some details by email (thema.apps@gmail.com) about your issue? Is it a crash? or an installation problem? I'll be happy to help you

author: Andrea Rivera
comment: Stop working! Keeps closing....

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Hi. Can you send me some details about the issues by email at thema.apps@gmail.com? I'll be happy to help you
EDIT: can you uninstall the watch face from your watch and install it again? It will reset the heart rate settings. Let the default value until I release the fix. Please send me an email to keep you in touch for the update.

author: Samuel Siu
comment: Works perfectly for my Moto 360 2nd generation.

author: Jakub Wawrzacz
comment: Cannot see the watch face on OnePlus5 and Moto360 2nd Gen. Corrected to 3 stars because I found a way to install it. Once the purchase is done, open Appstore on your watch, go to purchased apps and install there. The sync didn't work. Difficult but works like a charm and looks awesome.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Did you install the watch face on mobile and watch? Android wear 2.0 does not sync the application automatically as Android wear 1.5 did. EDIT: All app will work like that noe with Android Wear 2.0. That is not something specific to this app. Wear app are now standalone in their own store. Your rating is a bit unfair if due to this difficulty ;)

author: Reppy 07
comment: Not working at all for me. Stuck on the pink default. No settings are taking effect. Not from Android Wear app or long pressing the face on the watch. Using Huawei watch running 2.0. Been really excited to finally try it out, not sure why it's not working for me. Oh well. Refund it is.

author: Gail Mcdonald
comment: It's great. Has all the info I want in a glance

author: Robert Slack
comment: Get premium

author: walter hill
comment: Excellent watch face love it

author: Clifton Dunaway
comment: This is still my primary watch face! I love it!

author: Alex Ford
comment: Love the look of the face and its a perfect lcd (or led) watch replica. It would get 5 stars if I could have a different colour scheme for ambient (always on) and on. For example I like on mode to replicate pressing the light/indiglo button on a normal lcd watch.
title: Great!

author: Hand Tool
comment: I'm very happy with the clean and easy to read style of this watch face. It is VERY stable, does not seem to drain the battery, and gives me the information I want at-a-glance.
title: Simply nice digital face

author: Irv Haas
comment: On this one watchface you get battery life, current temperature, day and date plus seconds.  It's a great look.
title: Looks Great!

author: Colin Bull
comment: One of many great watch faces from Thema i've got...
title: Great Watch Face

author: Joseph Rubin
comment: I love this guy! I bought 3 of his faces so far, they're awesome. My favorite is the Driver. But they're all really beautiful, and well made. Smartly put together. Thanks
title: Another great Watch face from this guy!

author: Dale Huhtala
comment: Looks good but steps still don't update consistently. Sent an email but no reply.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Verify that network data & gps are activated for weather. Concerning steps, do you have Google Fit installed on your mobile? You need it. Once installed, select the Steps counter as a widget in the settings: An access request to history will be displayed, you will need to accept it. Please send me an email if you encounter any issue

title: Steps don't update correctly

author: Michael Wilson
comment: Nice watch face plenty of customisation and works well on my moto 360 :)
title: Nice watch face

author: Ian Fraser
comment: Good, clear functional watch face.
title: One of my fave watch faces

author: Jim Mitchell
comment: Excellent face easy to customize

author: Paul Brocklehurst
comment: Like it

author: John Sam George
comment: God bless
title: Awesome

author: Kyle Holley
comment: Really great

author: Danny Kirk
comment: This is my second Thema watchface. My first one is the Runners watch face. I switch between this one and the Runners watchface. I am using the latest Huawei watch. I use the  watch face to show the watch battery, digital time in 12 hour mode, the date and day, the step count and the weather. I have the watch set up pretty much the way its shown on this page. I set the circles so if I click on the step count circle it will auto pull up google fit on my watch and show me the exact step count. If I click on the weather circle it goes to google weather perfectly. I do not use google fit on my phone since its already on my watch and this watchface connects to it nicely. There is a delay on presenting the exact step count on the circle, but no problem I can click the circle and get the exact step count. Very Nice!

author: Kevin Brownlee
comment: I've always wore digital watches, and this one is the best one I've found. I emailed the Dev with a question and he answered me almost immediately...that was awesome!
title: Best digital face

author: Spike Holden
comment: Thema faces are the best. Look good and work!
title: Excellent again

comment: Stuff
title: Good

author: Ceawlin of Wessex
comment: ..please add more colour options,  also the 2 info pane rings don't look good on a square face. I can tell this wasn't designed for square faces, clearly the Dev made this for a round face and just made everything square as an afterthought. However I love these digital style retro watch faces, I like the interactive options.. I just think it could look nicer. There is also a military digital wear face similar to this. I think this one looks better but has less colour options.
title: Like it but...

comment: I can't keep the women off me trying to get a better look at my watch! Only problem is I'm married.
title: The ladies love it!!

comment: Looks nice with good options and settings on phone works fast and smooth. Awesome work!
title: Great face

comment: Very cool on the LG Urbane!

author: Cody Schadegg
comment: Would love interactivity on this face, 5 stars then. Love faces from this developer!**interactivity update, this face is awesome!

reply.author: thema
reply.content: I just published a new release with interactivity features. Among them: detailed data on touch, switch data on touch, system apps shortcuts! It should be available soon, depending on Google's deployment duration

title: Very sharp digital..

author: David Gomez
comment: The watch face is ok but seems like the screen on duration modifier does not work, i am using moto 360 watch with an Lg Optimus G Pro running 4.4.2
title: The app is ok but...

author: Chris MacK
comment: I like this watch face just move watch battery percentage to be an option on widgets. Instead of right there next to time. It will make it look cleaner. You can even move seconds up and add a 3rd if desired.
title: Good watch just move battery percentage

author: Luke B
comment: Great watch face, very practical and quick to read. However, I do wish there was a dimming option for ambient mode because it is a bit too bright at night.
title: Great watch face

comment: It's perfect! Simple, easy and love the color combos.
title: Very nice

comment: Sweet face. Looks great, lots of features.

title: Moto 360

comment: Nice.  Not too spartan, but not as busy as some.  Will  be my go to.  I like some other them a faces too, but this is my favorite.

author: this nuts for you
comment: Has potential but for a dollar could be better needs more detail games go for a dollar and have great detail.
title: Potential

author: Jay Torez
comment: Won't appear on my watch or on s6. Resynching all apps from android  wear did not help.  Okay, it finally appeared on my watch a day after. Other watch face I bought, their app appears almost immediately on the Android wear app "faces" option. There I can easily configure the colors, et. al from my phone. Please fix it and I will give it a 5 stars.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Watch Face & application synchronisation between watch & mobile only depends on bluetooth & android Wear. It can be long depending on the weight of the application. There are some known issue in android Wear about this.

title: Where is it.
